Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
  GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, Enemy, Node, Path, StatusBar, StatusBar.LockButton, StatusBar.SellButton, StatusBar.TowerButton, StatusBar.UpgradeButton, StatusBar.UpgradeStuff, Tower
public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object

A majority of classes in this game extend GameObject. It contains many helpful methods used to find positions and intersections of objects

myBuffer - the Graphics object that draws the square.
